ami_for_household.description: HUD's value for the Area Median Income (AMI) for the given location and household size. Note due to HUD's methodology and discretion this is not a linear extrapolation of 100% AMI.

80_percent_ami_for_household.description: HUD's value for 80% of the Area Median Income (AMI) for the given location and household size.

150_percent_ami_for_household.description: HUD's value for 150% of the Area Median Income (AMI) for the given location and household size. Note due to HUD's methodology and discretion this is not a linear extrapolation of 100% AMI.

ami_cbsa.description: The Core-Based Statistical Area (CBSA) identifier used for the HUD AMI values.

ami_metro.description: The metro area used for the HUD AMI values.

ami_qualification.description: The classification of the provided income into AMI ranges used to evaluate incentive eligibility.
